msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The following changes apply to DataGrid only.
The set methods for Grid properties that affect the measured size or display now invalidate as appropriate.
Fixed the rowHeight and requestedRowCount property default values in DataGrid/gridPropertDefaults.
When the Grid columns property changes, update the ColumnHeaderBar's dataProvider.
Temporarily removed support for column generation.
Fixed the intermittent empty DataGrid problem.
QE notes: changes apply to Spark DataGrid only
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The following changes apply to DataGrid only.
-Optimized getCellY so that it uses a recently searched row instead of always starting from the beginning
-setCellHeight now tries to correct the recently searched rows' y values instead of clearing them.
-Fixed getContentHeight so that it returns the correct height when the number of rows is specified.
-Initial implementation of insertRows which is used to handle ADD events from the data provider.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The following changes apply to Spark DataGrid only.   Code reviews have been deferred until the implementation is closer to completion.

-Update GridDimensions to account for changes to the defaultRowHeight through setting the typical cell height. The defaultRowHeight is now calculated as the max of the typicalCellHeights. Also, added a method "clearTypicalCellWidthsAndHeights()" to allow the typical item to be reset.
-Fixed a bug in GridLayout so that it now sets explicit width columns in updateTypicalCellSizes, while returning only an array of the column indices that are natural size.
-Fixed a bug in GridLayout so it cleans up the visible items when dataProvider == null.
-Grid now clears GridDimensions whenever columns or dataProvider is set. It also clears the typical cell widths and heights when the typical item changes.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The following changes apply to Spark DataGrid only.   Code reviews have been deferred until the implementation is closer to completion.
-update getRowBounds and getColumnBounds to be more efficient.
-getCellBounds returns null when you provide it with indices that are out of bounds. Updated GridLayout to account for the null case.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The following changes apply to Spark DataGrid only.   Code reviews have been deferred until the implementation is closer to completion.

Substantially revised the way DataGrid/Grid typicalItem is used by GridLayout to compute column widths and (soon) the default row height.  Typical item based column widths are now computed just once and cached.
Made the GridDimensions getCellX() and getCellY() methods public.
Temporarily added fixedRowHeight property to Grid.
